item.title: What’s new in Windows Server 2012 R2 Hyper-V
item.description: On TechEd Windows Server 2012 R2 is announced. Here are some highlights of “Hyper-V – What’s New in Windows Serve 2012 R2” session (MDC-B330): Windows Azure IaaS compatibility—Windows Azure IaaS uses exactly the same virtualization as Windows Server 2012 Hyper-V. So VM’s on-premise can be moved to Azure (Iaas) without problems Generation 2 Virtual Machines (VMs). In the generation 2 VM are many emulated devices removed and it boots from virtual SCSI or synthetic network adapters.
